title: Concept Mapping-Based Self-Directed Learning for Technical Problem Diagnosis and Resolution

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary engineering principles and technical problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Focused on technical problems occurring in actual industrial settings for current professionals. Learners participate flexibly in learning activities using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex technical problems and express them through concept mapping
Learners can improve their problem-solving approaches using expert diagnostic maps and automated comparison tools
Learners can establish and evaluate action plans for technical problem-solving based on real-world cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
